response.overview: Triptych is a trilogy of experimental films depicting cancer by exploring the concept of visual beauty, magic, energy and mortality with dance, film and original music. Jennifer Faust is an oncology nurse who sought a way to capture the strength, pain, courage, beauty and ugliness that she has seen working with cancer patients. She hopes to honor her patients, and their battle, in an artistic way.
response.title: Triptych: Dust, Blood, and Water
